alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 7:07PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Box Elder and central Tooele Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 707 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 23 miles northeast of Wendover to 17 miles south of Clive to 22 miles west of Dugway English Village to near Dugway Proving Ground Test Range. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Knolls, Utah Test and Training Range North, Clive, Skull Valley, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Utah Test and Training Range South and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 26 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
